YAI is a cutting-edge mobile application developed using Angular and Ionic, tailored specifically for psychiatrists and mental health professionals. Inspired by the intuitive user experience and sleek interface of the ChatGPT mobile app, YAI offers an AI-powered assistant to support medical professionals in their day-to-day tasks.

The app provides a seamless, conversational interface where psychiatrists can ask questions, receive suggestions, generate clinical notes, and access mental health resourcesâ€”all powered by advanced AI integration.

title: myDawa â€“ eCommerce Website for Health Products
description:
myDawa is a feature-rich eCommerce platform built specifically for selling healthcare and wellness products online. Developed using Angular, Tailwind CSS, HTML, and SCSS, the platform offers a smooth, modern shopping experience tailored for pharmacies, supplement vendors, and health-focused brands.

From prescription products to fitness supplements and personal care items, myDawa provides a scalable solution for online health retail with a fully responsive design and seamless performance across devices.

title: Smart Balancer â€“ Finance & Expense Management App
description:
Smart Balancer is a full-featured finance and bookkeeping mobile app developed using Angular with Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS. Designed to streamline budgeting, expense tracking, and financial planning, the app takes inspiration from Zoho Books and delivers a clean, professional UI with powerful financial tools.

Built for individuals and small businesses, Smart Balancer provides users with real-time insights into income, expenses, account balances, and financial trendsâ€”all accessible on the go across Android and iOS devices.

Key Features:
âœ… User-friendly dashboard with real-time income and expense summary
âœ… Ability to add, edit, and categorize financial transactions
âœ… Generate visual financial reports and balance charts
âœ… Support for multiple accounts and currencies
âœ… Export financial data in PDF or CSV format
âœ… Secure login with cloud-based data synchronization
âœ… Cross-platform mobile support built with Angular & Ionic

Design & Development Highlights:
ğŸ“± Mobile-first design with an intuitive, professional UI/UX
âš™ï¸ Built using Angular for a performant and scalable SPA structure
ğŸ“ˆ Integrated Chart.js for dynamic, real-time financial visualizations
ğŸ’¼ Supports multi-account, multi-currency bookkeeping workflows
ğŸ” Emphasis on data security, backup, and cloud syncing
ğŸ“¤ Export-ready architecture for easy financial record keeping

ğŸ“Š Angular â€¢ TypeScript â€¢ Chart.js â€¢ HTML5 â€¢ Tailwind CSS â€¢ Bootstrap â€¢ Ionic
